001/*
002 * SPDX-FileCopyrightText: none

004 */
005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.MarkupLine;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.MarkupMultiline;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.EQNameUtils;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.StaticContext;
012
013import java.net.URI;
014import java.util.Collection;
015import java.util.List;
016import java.util.Map;
017
018import javax.xml.namespace.QName;
019
020import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
021import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
022
023public interface IModule {
024
025  String XML_NAMESPACE = "http://csrc.nist.gov/ns/oscal/metaschema/1.0";
026
027  /**
028   * Retrieves the location where the Metaschema module was loaded from.
029   *
030   * @return the location, or {@code null} if this information is not available
031   */
032  URI getLocation();
033
034  /**
035   * Get the long name for the Metaschema module.
036   *
037   * @return the name
038   */
039  @NonNull
040  MarkupLine getName();
041
042  /**
043   * Get the revision of the Metaschema module.
044   *
045   * @return the revision
046   */
047  @NonNull
048  String getVersion();
049
050  /**
051   * Retrieve the remarks associated with this Metaschema module, if any.
052   *
053   * @return the remarks or {@code null} if no remarks are defined
054   */
055  @Nullable
056  MarkupMultiline getRemarks();
057
058  /**
059   * Retrieves the unique short name for the Metaschema module, which provides a
060   * textual identifier for the Metaschema module.
061   *
062   * @return the short name
063   */
064  @NonNull
065  String getShortName();
066
067  /**
068   * Retrieves the XML namespace associated with the Metaschema module.
069   *
070   * @return a namespace
071   */
072  @NonNull
073  URI getXmlNamespace();
074
075  /**
076   * Retrieve the JSON schema base URI associated with the Metaschema module.
077   *
078   * @return the base URI
079   */
080  @NonNull
081  URI getJsonBaseUri();
082
083  /**
084   * Get the qualified name associated with the Metaschema module.
085   *
086   * @return the qualified name
087   */
088  default QName getQName() {
089    return new QName(getXmlNamespace().toASCIIString(), getShortName());
090  }
091
092  /**
093   * Retrieves all Metaschema modules imported by this Metaschema module.
094   *
095   * @return a list of imported Metaschema modules
096   */
097  @NonNull
098  List<? extends IModule> getImportedModules();
099
100  /**
101   * Retrieve the imported Metaschema module with the specified name, if it
102   * exists.
103   *
104   * @param name
105   *          the short name of the Metschema module to retrieve
106   * @return the imported Metaschema module or {@code null} if it doesn't exist
107   */
108  @Nullable
109  IModule getImportedModuleByShortName(String name);
110
111  /**
112   * Retrieves the top-level assembly definitions in this Metaschema module.
113   *
114   * @return the collection of assembly definitions
115   */
116  @NonNull
117  Collection<? extends IAssemblyDefinition> getAssemblyDefinitions();
118
119  /**
120   * Retrieves the top-level assembly definition in this Metaschema module with
121   * the matching name, if it exists.
122   *
123   * @param name
124   *          the definition name
125   *
126   * @return the matching assembly definition, or {@code null} if none match
127   */
128  @Nullable
129  IAssemblyDefinition getAssemblyDefinitionByName(@NonNull QName name);
130
131  /**
132   * Retrieves the top-level field definitions in this Metaschema module.
133   *
134   * @return the collection of field definitions
135   */
136  @NonNull
137  Collection<? extends IFieldDefinition> getFieldDefinitions();
138
139  /**
140   * Retrieves the top-level field definition in this Metaschema module with the
141   * matching name, if it exists.
142   *
143   * @param name
144   *          the definition name
145   *
146   * @return the matching field definition, or {@code null} if none match
147   */
148  @Nullable
149  IFieldDefinition getFieldDefinitionByName(@NonNull QName name);
150
151  /**
152   * Retrieves the top-level assembly and field definitions in this Metaschema
153   * module.
154   *
155   * @return a listing of assembly and field definitions
156   */
157  @NonNull
158  List<? extends IModelDefinition> getAssemblyAndFieldDefinitions();
159
160  /**
161   * Retrieves the top-level flag definitions in this Metaschema module.
162   *
163   * @return the collection of flag definitions
164   */
165  @NonNull
166  Collection<? extends IFlagDefinition> getFlagDefinitions();
167
168  /**
169   * Retrieves the top-level flag definition in this Metaschema module with the
170   * matching name, if it exists.
171   *
172   * @param name
173   *          the definition name
174   *
175   * @return the matching flag definition, or {@code null} if none match
176   */
177  @Nullable
178  IFlagDefinition getFlagDefinitionByName(@NonNull QName name);
179
180  /**
181   * Retrieves the assembly definition with a matching name from either: 1) the
182   * top-level assembly definitions from this Metaschema module, or 2) global
183   * assembly definitions from each imported Metaschema module in reverse order of
184   * import.
185   *
186   * @param name
187   *          the name of the assembly to find
188   * @return the assembly definition
189   */
190  @Nullable
191  IAssemblyDefinition getScopedAssemblyDefinitionByName(@NonNull QName name);
192
193  /**
194   * Retrieves the field definition with a matching name from either: 1) the
195   * top-level field definitions from this Metaschema module, or 2) global field
196   * definitions from each imported Metaschema module in reverse order of import.
197   *
198   * @param name
199   *          the name of the field definition to find
200   * @return the field definition
201   */
202  @Nullable
203  IFieldDefinition getScopedFieldDefinitionByName(@NonNull QName name);
204
205  /**
206   * Retrieves the flag definition with a matching name from either: 1) the
207   * top-level flag definitions from this Metaschema module, or 2) global flag
208   * definitions from each imported Metaschema module in reverse order of import.
209   *
210   * @param name
211   *          the name of the flag definition to find
212   * @return the flag definition
213   */
214  @Nullable
215  IFlagDefinition getScopedFlagDefinitionByName(@NonNull QName name);
216
217  /**
218   * Retrieves the top-level assembly definitions that are marked as roots from
219   * the current Metaschema module.
220   *
221   * @return a listing of assembly definitions marked as root
222   */
223  @NonNull
224  Collection<? extends IAssemblyDefinition> getRootAssemblyDefinitions();
225
226  /**
227   * Retrieve the top-level flag definitions that are marked global in this
228   * Metaschema module or in any imported Metaschema modules. The resulting
229   * collection is built by adding global definitions from each imported
230   * Metaschema module in order of import, then adding global definitions from the
231   * current Metaschema module. Such a map is built in this way for each imported
232   * Metaschema module in the chain. Values for clashing keys will be replaced in
233   * this order, giving preference to the "closest" definition.
234   *
235   * @return the collection of exported flag definitions
236   */
237  @NonNull
238  Collection<? extends IFlagDefinition> getExportedFlagDefinitions();
239
240  /**
241   * Retrieves the exported named flag definition, if it exists.
242   * <p>
243   * For information about how flag definitions are exported see
244   * {@link #getExportedFlagDefinitions()}.
245   *
246   * @param name
247   *          the definition name
248   * @return the flag definition, or {@code null} if it doesn't exist.
249   */
250  @Nullable
251  IFlagDefinition getExportedFlagDefinitionByName(@NonNull QName name);
252
253  /**
254   * Retrieve the top-level field definitions that are marked global in this
255   * Metaschema module or in any imported Metaschema module. The resulting
256   * collection is built by adding global definitions from each imported
257   * Metaschema module in order of import, then adding global definitions from the
258   * current Metaschema module. Such a map is built in this way for each imported
259   * Metaschema module in the chain. Values for clashing keys will be replaced in
260   * this order, giving preference to the "closest" definition
261   *
262   * @return the collection of exported field definitions
263   */
264  @NonNull
265  Collection<? extends IFieldDefinition> getExportedFieldDefinitions();
266
267  /**
268   * Retrieves the exported named field definition, if it exists.
269   * <p>
270   * For information about how field definitions are exported see
271   * {@link #getExportedFieldDefinitions()}.
272   *
273   * @param name
274   *          the definition name
275   * @return the field definition, or {@code null} if it doesn't exist.
276   */
277  @Nullable
278  IFieldDefinition getExportedFieldDefinitionByName(@NonNull QName name);
279
280  /**
281   * Retrieve the top-level assembly definitions that are marked global in this
282   * Metaschema module or in any imported Metaschema module. The resulting
283   * collection is built by adding global definitions from each imported
284   * Metaschema module in order of import, then adding global definitions from the
285   * current Metaschema module. This collection is built in this way for each
286   * imported Metaschema module in the chain. Items with duplicate names will be
287   * replaced in this order, giving preference to the "closest" definition
288   *
289   * @return the collection of exported assembly definitions
290   */
291  @NonNull
292  Collection<? extends IAssemblyDefinition> getExportedAssemblyDefinitions();
293
294  /**
295   * Retrieves the exported named assembly definition, if it exists.
296   * <p>
297   * For information about how assembly definitions are exported see
298   * {@link #getExportedAssemblyDefinitions()}.
299   *
300   * @param name
301   *          the definition name
302   * @return the assembly definition, or {@code null} if it doesn't exist.
303   */
304  @Nullable
305  IAssemblyDefinition getExportedAssemblyDefinitionByName(@NonNull QName name);
306
307  /**
308   * Retrieves the top-level assembly definitions that are marked as roots from
309   * the current Metaschema module and any imported Metaschema modules.
310   *
311   * @return a listing of assembly definitions marked as root
312   */
313  @NonNull
314  Collection<? extends IAssemblyDefinition> getExportedRootAssemblyDefinitions();
315
316  /**
317   * Retrieves the exported named root assembly definition, if it exists.
318   * <p>
319   * For information about how assembly definitions are exported see
320   * {@link #getExportedAssemblyDefinitions()}.
321   *
322   * @param name
323   *          the root name
324   * @return the assembly definition, or {@code null} if it doesn't exist.
325   */
326  @Nullable
327  IAssemblyDefinition getExportedRootAssemblyDefinitionByName(QName name);
328
329  /**
330   * Get the mapping of prefix to namespace URI for use in resolving the namespace
331   * of lexical qualified named in Metapath.
332   *
333   * @return the mapping
334   */
335  @NonNull
336  Map<String, String> getNamespaceBindings();
337
338  /**
339   * Used to parse a flag name reference to produce a qualified name.
340   *
341   * @param nameRef
342   *          the name reference
343   * @return the qualified name
344   */
345  @NonNull
346  default QName toFlagQName(@NonNull String nameRef) {
347    return EQNameUtils.parseName(
348        nameRef,
349        getModuleStaticContext().getFlagPrefixResolver());
350  }
351
352  /**
353   * Used to parse a flag name reference to produce a qualified name.
354   *
355   * @param modelNamespace
356   *          the namespace to use or {@code null}
357   * @param nameRef
358   *          the name reference
359   * @return the qualified name
360   */
361  @NonNull
362  default QName toFlagQName(@Nullable String modelNamespace, @NonNull String nameRef) {
363    return modelNamespace == null
364        ? new QName(nameRef)
365        : new QName(modelNamespace, nameRef);
366  }
367
368  /**
369   * Used to parse a model name reference to produce a qualified name.
370   *
371   * @param nameRef
372   *          the name reference
373   * @return the qualified name
374   */
375  @NonNull
376  default QName toModelQName(@NonNull String nameRef) {
377    return EQNameUtils.parseName(
378        nameRef,
379        getModuleStaticContext().getModelPrefixResolver());
380  }
381
382  /**
383   * Used to parse a flag name reference to produce a qualified name.
384   *
385   * @param modelNamespace
386   *          the namespace to use or {@code null}
387   * @param nameRef
388   *          the name reference
389   * @return the qualified name
390   */
391  @NonNull
392  default QName toModelQName(@Nullable String modelNamespace, @NonNull String nameRef) {
393    String namespace = modelNamespace == null ? getXmlNamespace().toASCIIString() : modelNamespace;
394    return new QName(namespace, nameRef);
395  }
396
397  /**
398   * Get the Metapath static context for compiling Metapath expressions that query
399   * instances of this model.
400   *
401   * @return the static context
402   */
403  @NonNull
404  StaticContext getModuleStaticContext();
405}
